task.summary: Removed all project-specific and configurational files to clean up the repository.
Added base templates (`base.html`, error pages), and new Django settings for `local`, `test`, and `production` environments. Configured security, email, caching, and Keycloak integration.
Add `AuthButton` component for authentication handling in frontend
Add `apiService` utility and integrate with `TodoApp` component
Fix file imports, typos, and CORS settings; integrate `TodoApp` with apiService
Fix file imports, typos, and CORS settings; integrate `TodoApp` with apiService
Add authentication and todos APIs; update `.editorconfig` and increase consistency
Integrate Keycloak authentication middleware and backend; update CORS and authentication settings.
Integrate Keycloak authentication middleware and backend; update CORS and authentication settings.
Update Keycloak URL in configuration file
Update Keycloak server URL to use localhost in local environment configuration
Remove deprecated authentication and todos modules; clean up Keycloak integration and related settings.
Remove `.idea` project files from version control
Add Keycloak integration with authentication middleware and JWKS caching; update CORS settings
Remove allauth integration and related configurations, templates, and tests; clean up project dependencies and settings

MESSAGE.value: Removed all project-specific and configurational files to clean up the repository.

Added initial project setup files and configurations. Includes environment variables for Django, PostgreSQL, Keycloak, and Redis, along with editor, version control, pre-commit hooks, and templates for frontend and backend.

Add foundational project setup with Django templates and configuration files.
- Included base Django templates (`base.html`, error pages: 403, 404, 500). - Added project configuration files: `base.py`, `local.py`, `test.py`, `production.py`. - Introduced `.idea` code style configuration. - Configured static and media handling with AWS S3 in production settings. - Established initial middleware, authentication, and app setup.
Added base templates (`base.html`, error pages), and new Django settings for `local`, `test`, and `production` environments. Configured security, email, caching, and Keycloak integration.
Add `AuthButton` component for authentication handling in frontend
Add `apiService` utility and integrate with `TodoApp` component
Fix file imports, typos, and CORS settings; integrate `TodoApp` with apiService
Add authentication and todos APIs; update `.editorconfig` and increase consistency
Integrate Keycloak authentication middleware and backend; update CORS and authentication settings.
Update Keycloak URL in configuration file
Update Keycloak server URL to use localhost in local environment configuration
Remove deprecated authentication and todos modules; clean up Keycloak integration and related settings.
Remove `.idea` project files from version control
Add Keycloak integration with authentication middleware and JWKS caching; update CORS settings
Remove allauth integration and related configurations, templates, and tests; clean up project dependencies and settings
